closeInventory(Player) - Static method in class de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.impl.util.MenuUtil
Closing the menu 1 tick later prevents item duping.
In order to close all other views (like books that normally don't have a close-method) a inventory-open is sent prior to closing the inventory.
Note: This is not a API method and does not notify, it's to visually close a view on the client.
closeSilent(Player) - Method in interface de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.api.MenuRenderer
to be called from inventory events - won't close the actual inventory, but will untrack this player.
